repository_scope: Diamond AI Deterministic Standards Certification Program - Phase 1 Implementation
decision_statement: This artifact resolves verification authority only. It does not modify canonical truth.
reason_for_supersession: Initial verification artifact for Phase-1 implementation. No prior verifications exist within this repository scope. This supersession record establishes verification singularity and prevents future ambiguity.

governance_rules.verification_uniqueness: Only one active verification may exist per repository scope without explicit supersession metadata
governance_rules.prohibited_condition: Multiple verification artifacts asserting outcomes for identical scope without supersession hierarchy

audit_trail.creation_method: Automated supersession resolution per No Fate Contract requirements
audit_trail.supersession_trigger: User request to achieve DETERMINISTIC_COMPLIANCE for repository
